ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards]
ygData.msgSnippet: I have had various kinds of giants run from me but can t recall if, before the patch, any Hill Giants ever did.  I do know there was some sort of change,
ygData.messageBody:
I have had various kinds of giants run from me but can't recall if,
before the patch, any Hill Giants ever did. I do know there was some
sort of change, however, as Crag Spiders (ugh, more silks...) now run
when at low health where they did not this weekend.

I will look at "the wobble" tonight to see if it might actually become
"the jog" that was intended. I -really- like the new tambourine
graphic. They did a very good job even if I am still strumming it. My
only concern is that it will be almost totally covered in a human hand,
it's very small on a wood elf as it is. Anybody seen a human with one
yet? I haven't seen anybody besides myself with one on E'ci but not
many higher level bards spend time in EK. *smirk*


--- John Tatsukawa <john@...> wrote:
> /cheer I noticed this as well. Kind of strange that we beat upon it
> like a
> drum. /shrug
>
> Also I've noticed in Rathe Mtns, that the hill giants now start to
> run when
> they are low on health. Makes it a little easier to ensure that we
> are
> charming the victor.
>
> Lastly, has anyone noticed a difference in our running style? It
> seems to
> me that it has smoothed out, but since I was bumping up and down in
> the
> swamp, I couldn't be certain. Just interested if anyone else noticed
> a
> difference.
